title: Literature Review on Recent Advances on Terahertz Antenna Design
content: The terahertz (THz) frequency range, often overlooked in the past, is now gaining recognition for its unique properties and diverse applications. THz waves, positioned between microwave and infrared frequencies, offer safety, broad bandwidth, and low energy consumption. This review highlights the burgeoning importance of THz technology in communication systems, spectroscopy, biomedical imaging, and various industries. It emphasizes the significance of novel antenna designs in enhancing THz system performance and functionality, enabling rapid communication, data transmission, spectroscopic analysis, and sensor capabilities.
